info.name: /tradd
info.description: Add an user or a role in your temporary channel, allowing them to view and join it.
examples: /tradd @bieeu - The user `bieeu` will be added in your channel.
/tradd 919664522267070534 @bieeu - The role of ID `919664522267070534` and `bieeu` will be added in your channel.
/tradd 919664522267070534 862740130385494027 286166598048284683 @bieeu - All these members will be added in your channel.

membersAdded: You added ${0} in your channel! To remove them, use **/tremove**.
